features: Advanced CV matching algorithm with semantic understanding
Multi-industry skill normalization (Tech, Finance, Healthcare, Arts, Construction, etc.)
AI-powered CV parsing with Claude (Plan-based model selection)
Professional summary extraction and toggle view

changes: Implemented plan-based Claude AI model selection (Haiku for Free/Starter/Basic, Sonnet 4.5 for Professional/Business/Enterprise)
Added LinkedIn profile URL extraction from CVs
Added LinkedIn profile display with external link in CV details
Added professional summary extraction from CVs
Replaced Download CV button with View Summary toggle button
Added collapsible Professional Summary section in CV details
Made all navigation bars sticky (Dashboard, CV List, CV Details, Analytics)
Fixed retry parsing button visibility during CV processing
Fixed currency display showing 'Custom' for zero values
Fixed ZAR currency rounding to show proper decimals (R1.20 vs R1.00)
Fixed missing formatCurrency import in Master Account Dashboard
Fixed createdAt timestamp for existing users converted to submasters
Removed debug logging that exposed Claude model selection strategy
Improved CV parsing retry functionality with shared parseCV function
Cost optimization: 67% savings on lower tier plans using Haiku model
Initial production release

Multi-industry support
